products.title: Utopia Charcoal Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Dark and contemporary, this utopia charcoal vertical blind is a wonderful addition to their tuiss collection, so sleek, so elegant. products.metadescription: With a shade that's warmer than cream, coffee hints, along with biscuit tones, the utopia latte vertical blind brings comfort and warmth to your home, as well as a smart look at your windows. products.title: Utopia White Vertical Blind
products.metadescription:
The sharpness of white is softened by a subtle woven texture to this clean, bright fabric, which dazzles with its classy simplicity.
  
Combine that with the robust practicality of a vertical blind and you have a versatile window covering thatll bring luminosity to any space.
products.productdescription:
The sharpness of white is softened by a subtle woven texture to this clean, bright fabric, which dazzles with its classy simplicity.
  
Combine that with the robust practicality of a vertical blind and you have a versatile window covering thatll bring luminosity to any space.
